overview:
Shailesh heads Support.com’s India R&D center and is the engineering head for some of the key products of the company. Bangalore houses the largest R&D team of support.com and several of its patented technologies are designed and built from this center.

Shailesh joined in Jan 2007 and is now the Country Manager for the Bangalore R&D center. Support.com services are offered directly to consumers under the Support.com brand and as a white label service via retailers, ISVs and ISPs. Support.com also offers consumer software for Windows, Mac and Android platforms.

Prior to joining Support.com, Shailesh was in an engineering management position at Accelrys and worked on their bioinformatics division. Shailesh was also a cofounder MailSanctity which was an anti spam product. He also spent nearly four years at McAfee.com at their Santa Clara office working on their anti virus as well as managing the McAfee Security Center product.
